Objective: Verify navigating to Returns page from My Account Returns link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click 'View your return requests' link
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Returns Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Returns Page

Objective: Verify navigating to Returns page from Returns right column options
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Returns in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Returns Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Returns Page

Objective: Verify Returns Page when there are no Returns
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Returns in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Returns Page and a text "You do not have any Returns!" should be shown
Actual Result: The User is taken to Returns Page and a text "You do not have any Returns!" is shown

Objective: Verify Continue button in Returns page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Returns in right column options
3) Click Continue button
Expected Result: The User should be taken to My Account Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to My Account Page

Objective: Verify Returns when there are a few Returns
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Return a few items from order history
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Returns in right column options
Expected Result: The details of Returns should be shown in table format
Actual Result: The details of Returns is shown in table format

Objective: Verify the Returns Page and Return Details Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Return a few items from order history
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Returns in right column options
3) Click the view button in any Returns
4) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The Returns Page and Return Details Page should work in all supported environments
Actual Result: The Returns Page and Return Details Page works in all supported environments
